Read in PREP_pds.R script
```{r, code=xfun::read_utf8('PREP_pds.R')}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

####Summary table for Male PDS~Age linear regression model
```{r}
PT_M <- lm(PDS_M_tot~age_years, data = PDS_M) #linear model
summ(PT_M,
     robust = TRUE, #robust standard error = HC3 as per sandwich package
     scale = TRUE,  #scaled beta used
     confint = TRUE, digits = 3) #get confidence intervals. 95% CI by default )
```

####Summary table for Female PDS~Age linear regression model 
```{r}
PT_F <- lm(PDS_F_tot~age_years, data = PDS_F) #linear model
#model summary.
summ(PT_F, 
     robust = TRUE, #robust standard error = HC3 as per sandwich package
     scale = TRUE,  #scaled beta used
     confint = TRUE, digits = 3) #get confidence intervals. 95% CI by default 
```
